task.summary: //Done: create Classes for FSM functions, front controller paradigma
//Done: create Classes for FSM functions, front controller paradigma -> started: category drop down menu, sort after function (not yet functional)
User Persistence seems to be working
User Persistence seems to be working, duedate funtional even when empty
Blank REST Servlet (RestServlet) and Filter classes (in auxiliary_REST folder)
Cookies included, User is persistent after newTodo/updateTodo. First version, very likely still some bugs.
Another minor bug fix: NewId has been secured, no more doubled ID's (source of bugs for completedToggle and Discard)
Cookies included, User is persistent after newTodo/updateTodo. Second Version, Login working
Cookies included, User is persistent after newTodo/updateTodo. Third version, login really working now.
isOverdue() color change in .jsp page working
STABLE VERSION (hopefully...) -User and Todo Persistence with Cookies and XML files -Todos sorted after due date and completed -due and overdue todos are marked in orange -search for todos (script)
